original_text: And with them he sent Levites, even Shemaiah, and Nethaniah, and Zebadiah, and Asahel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehonathan, and Adonijah, and Tobijah, and Tobadonijah, Levites; and with them Elishama and Jehoram, priests.
korean_text: 또 그들과 함께 레위 사람 스마야와 느다냐와 스바댜와 아사헬과 스미라못과 여호나단과 아도니야와 도비야와 도바도니야 등 레위 사람들을 보내고 또 저희와 함께 제사장 엘리사마와 여호람을 보내었더니

sentences.original_text: And with them he sent Levites
even Shemaiah, and Nethaniah, and Zebadiah, and Asahel
and Shemiramoth, and Jehonathan, and Adonijah
and with them Elishama and Jehoram, priests
